VoiceList.Entry: Rufus “Now then… We're faced with two issues.”
“1 Destroy Meteor. 2 Remove the barrier around North Cave and defeat Sephiroth.”
“Any ideas?”
Rufus “What?”
Rufus “You're going to ram Meteor?”
“Do you think we have the technology to do it?”
Heidegger “Gya haah hah hah! The first problem's already solved!”
“Meteor will soon be smashed to bits!”
“The plan is already in motion. We are collecting Huge Materia from each region.”
“Gyaa haa ha ha!”
Heidegger “We've already collected Materia from Nibelheim.”
“All that's left are Corel and Fort Condor.”
“I've already dispatched troops to Corel.”
Scarlet “Huge Materia is a high-density, special type of Materia made through a special compression process in Mako reactors.”
“The energy extracted from it is 330 times the strength of normal Materia.”
“Kya,ha,ha! How about that!?”
“We will gather all the Huge Materia together and ram it into Meteor.”
“That will cause a huge explosion, reducing Meteor literally to bits!!”
Scarlet “First things first!”
“Right now,we've got to collect Huge Materia from each area.”
Heidegger “Strange. I can't reach the President!”
Heidegger “Huh? Why are you giving the orders?”
Reeve “Not the President. To Sister Ray!”
Reeve “None of that matters!”
“The reactor's output is increasing all by itself!”
Reeve “We can't do that! It's inoperable!”
Reeve “What about the mainframe? Who!?”
“Hey,call the mainframe!”
Reeve “I don't care how you do it!!”
Scarlet “Kya,haa,haa. What is it Reeve? You're speaking strangely.”
Scarlet “Wait a minute. That's not wise!”
“It must cool for 3 hours or it won't work. Reeve,shut off the machine!”
“Someone has switched the machine over to mainframe operation!”
“We can't operate it from here.”
Reeve “Looks like Cloud and the others are on their way. Stay out of the way!”
Reeve “That's a private matter…”
Reeve “Hey! Wait!!”
Reeve “Cloud,everybody! Sorry…”
Reeve “But!!”
Heidegger “Don't be foolish! I don't remember anyone putting you in charge!”
Heidegger “The Peace Preservation force will do their best to beat the enemy!”
Heidegger “Because of them,I… I…”
Heidegger “The President is dead! Now I'm doing things my way!”
Scarlet “Kya,ha,ha.”
“Heidegger! Now I'm going to use the new weapon!”
